gods.name: Zeus
gods.description: The king of the gods, ruler of the sky and thunder.

gods.name: Hera
gods.description: Queen of the gods, protector of marriage and family.

gods.name: Poseidon
gods.description: God of the sea and earthquakes.

gods.name: Athena
gods.description: Goddess of wisdom, courage, and warfare.

gods.name: Apollo
gods.description: God of music, prophecy, and healing.

gods.name: Aphrodite
gods.description: Goddess of love and beauty.

gods.name: Hades
gods.description: Lord of the underworld.

gods.name: Odin
gods.description: The All-Father, wise and mysterious.

gods.name: Thor
gods.description: God of thunder, protector of humanity.

gods.name: Loki
gods.description: The trickster, both friend and foe.

gods.name: Frigg
gods.description: Queen of the Aesir, wife of Odin.

gods.name: Freya
gods.description: Goddess of love, fertility, and magic.

gods.name: Ra
gods.description: The sun god, creator of all life.

gods.name: Isis
gods.description: Goddess of magic, motherhood, and healing.

gods.name: Osiris
gods.description: God of the afterlife and resurrection.

gods.name: Anubis
gods.description: Guardian of the dead, associated with mummification.

gods.name: Horus
gods.description: Falcon-headed god of kingship and protection.

gods.name: Brahma
gods.description: The creator, with four faces representing the four Vedas.

gods.name: Vishnu
gods.description: The preserver, often incarnated as avatars like Rama and Krishna.

gods.name: Shiva
gods.description: The destroyer and transformer, associated with asceticism.

gods.name: Lakshmi
gods.description: Goddess of wealth and prosperity.

gods.name: Ganesha
gods.description: Elephant-headed remover of obstacles.

gods.name: Jade Emperor
gods.description: Supreme ruler of heaven.

gods.name: Nuwa
gods.description: Creator goddess who repaired the sky.

gods.name: Sun Wukong (Monkey King)
gods.description: Mischievous and powerful hero.

gods.name: Guanyin
gods.description: Goddess of compassion and mercy.

gods.name: Zhong Kui
gods.description: Demon queller and protector against evil spirits.

gods.name: Chang'e
gods.description: Moon goddess and wife of Hou Yi.

gods.name: Itzamn√°
gods.description: The creator, ruler of day and night, and god of medicine.

gods.name: Chaac
gods.description: The rain god, associated with lightning and fertility.

gods.name: Kukulkan
gods.description: The feathered serpent, worshipped from Guatemala to the Yucatan.

gods.name: Quetzalcoatl
gods.description: The equivalent of Kukulkan in Aztec mythology.

gods.name: Ah Puch
gods.description: God of death and the underworld.

gods.name: Ix Chel
gods.description: Goddess of fertility, childbirth, and the moon.

gods.name: Cabrakan
gods.description: God of earthquakes and mountains.

gods.name: Obatala
gods.description: Creator deity, associated with purity and wisdom.

gods.name: Oshun
gods.description: Goddess of love, beauty, and fresh water.

gods.name: Shango
gods.description: God of thunder, fire, and dance.

gods.name: Yemaya
gods.description: Goddess of the sea, motherhood, and nurturing.

gods.name: Ogun
gods.description: God of iron, war, and technology.

gods.name: Eshu
gods.description: Trickster deity, guardian of crossroads.

gods.name: Oya
gods.description: Goddess of winds, storms, and transformation.

gods.name: Osanyin
gods.description: God of healing, herbs, and medicine.

gods.name: Sky Woman
gods.description: A central figure in the creation story, she fell from the sky and brought life to the Earth.

gods.name: Hahgwehdiyu (Iktomi)
gods.description: Trickster figure known for his mischievous and sometimes malevolent deeds.

gods.name: Heno
gods.description: Spirit of thunder and lightning, associated with storms and natural phenomena.

gods.name: Awenhai
gods.description: Spirit of the winds and atmosphere, associated with the breath of life.

gods.name: Orenda
gods.description: A spiritual power or force that pervades the universe and empowers individuals.

gods.name: Ataensic
gods.description: Another name for Sky Woman, often associated with the moon and fertility.

gods.name: Tawiscara
gods.description: A malevolent figure associated with winter, cold, and hardship.

gods.name: Atahensic
gods.description: A goddess associated with childbirth, fertility, and the Earth's bounty.
